The EnhancedUI class handles the UI additions to the Starcraft game screen which augment the original Starcraft UI system but are not directly related to debugging.

void update();

Should be called from AIModule::onFrame. Displays the terrain markers, base locations, and progress bars for units being constructed, morphing, or training.
